title: Chat Master
message: Docofmed tops chat with 6,906 messages, the clan's true Yapper.

title: Kill King
message: Loafy leads boss kills: 15,996 slaughters, unmatched grinding machine.

title: XP Giant
message: Docofmed boasts 285,354,182 XP, second only to loafy's 322M.

title: Rising Duckling
message: Strixter, 98‑day veteran, already posted 332 messages, climbing the chatter ladder.

title: Silent Grinder
message: Theerecter whispers with only 20 messages—silent grinder lurking behind 10,948 kills.

title: Ghost of XP
message: Loafy, XP titan with 322M but just 4 messages—silent powerhouse.
